docs.lead_paragraph: " AMERRY CHRISTMAS!" The cheery greetig begins to be heard in streets and shops and happy homes throughout the city; and the good-will of the season is not content to stop with the friendly wish. To give, to share the blessings of life with others, is the essence of the Christmas spirit.

headline.main: AT CHRISTOMAS, REMEMBER THE NEEDIEST; A Gift Is a Flame That Warms Both Giver and Recipient
